Statements.Statement:
select `menu`.`MenuId`, `menu`.`ParentId`, `menu`.`MenuName`, `menu`.`MenuType`, `menu`.`Namespace`, `menu`.`FormName`, `menu`.`OrderSeq`, `menu`.`DepthNo`, `menu`.`UseYn`
from tb_menu_master AS menu where UseYn = 'Y' and DelYn != 'Y' order by depthNo, orderseq;

select `menu`.`MenuId`, `menu`.`ParentId`, `pmenu`.`MenuName` as ParentName, `menu`.`MenuName`, `menu`.`MenuType`, `typecd`.`name` as MenuTypeName, `menu`.`Namespace`, `menu`.`FormName`, `menu`.`OrderSeq`, `menu`.`DepthNo`, `menu`.`UseYn`
from tb_menu_master AS menu left join tb_menu_master AS pmenu on pmenu.MenuId = menu.ParentId left join tb_code_detail AS typecd on typecd.MasterCode = 'MENUTYPE' and typecd.code = menu.menutype where 1=1 and ifnull(menu.ParentId,'') = @ParentId order by depthNo, orderseq;

select `menu`.`MenuId`, `menu`.`ParentId`, `pmenu`.`MenuName` as ParentName, `menu`.`MenuName`, `menu`.`MenuType`, `typecd`.`name` as MenuTypeName, `menu`.`Namespace`, `menu`.`FormName`, `menu`.`OrderSeq`, `menu`.`DepthNo`, `menu`.`UseYn`
from tb_menu_master AS menu left join tb_menu_master AS pmenu on pmenu.MenuId = menu.ParentId left join tb_code_detail AS typecd on typecd.MasterCode = 'MENUTYPE' and typecd.code = menu.menutype where 1=1 and ifnull(menu.MenuId,'') = @MenuId order by depthNo, orderseq;

INSERT INTO `soodal`.`tb_menu_master` (`MenuId`, `ParentId`, `MenuName`, `MenuType`, `Namespace`, `FormName`, `OrderSeq`, `DepthNo`, `UseYn`, `DelYn`, `CreateDt`) VALUES (FN_CreateMenuId(@ParentId, @MenuId), @ParentId, @MenuName, @MenuType, @Namespace, @FormName, 1, (Length(@ParentId) / 3) + 1, @UseYn, 'N', now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `MenuName` = @MenuName, `MenuType` = @MenuType, `Namespace` = @Namespace, `FormName` = @FormName, `UseYn` = @UseYn, `DelYn` = 'N', `UpdateDt` = now(), `DeleteDt` = null ;
